thread.title: German Consumer Group Sues Facebook
thread.title_full: German Consumer Group Sues Facebook - WSJ

author: Friedrich Geiger
title: German Consumer Group Sues Facebook
text:
BERLIN—A German consumer group said Friday that it has filed a lawsuit against Facebook Inc., accusing the social network of making misleading claims and terms of service.
Facebook’s claim that it is free of charge is misleading, argues the Federation of German Consumer Organizations, or VZBV. The group, which is funded in part by the German government, also regards 19 clauses of Facebook’s terms of service as illegal and criticizes... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
